text: Egh me men garir gumazibar biziba okɨman markɨ. Bizir me bar moghɨra amiba, men garir gumaziba dar ganɨva egh me akar e kurir kamɨn ziam fam. A God en Akurvazir Gumazimɨn akam. Me akar kamɨn ziam fɨsɨ, ingangarir gumaziba bar deravɨra men garir gumazibar akabar gɨn mangɨva arazir aghuimra men akagh.
